scripts.dev: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && node --max_old_space_size=8192 && yarn lint-md && vuepress dev docs
scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && node --max_old_space_size=8192 && vuepress build docs
scripts.publish: cd ./vdoing && npm publish && cd .. && yarn updateTheme
scripts.updateTheme: yarn remove vuepress-theme-vdoing && rm -rf node_modules && yarn && yarn add vuepress-theme-vdoing -D
